articles.author: Anthony Wood
articles.title: What to expect during today's 'blood moon' total lunar eclipse - Space
articles.description: The Sept. 7-8 total lunar eclipse will be visible to over 7 billion people in Asia, Australia, Africa and eastern Europe.
articles.content: Look to the skies on Sept. 7-8 to witness Earth's shadow roll over the lunar disk, giving rise to a deep red "blood moon." Here's what to expect during each phase of this week's total lunar eclipse.… [+5272 chars]
